name: Garlic Baguette
description: Sliced baguette. Taken freshly out of the oven, the bread has a crispy, crackling crust, and soft, fluffy crumb. The aroma of butter and garlic further adds to the baguette's tastiness! No wonder you often see Fontainians buying a baguette on their way home after work.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Garlic Baguette
suspicious.description: Sliced baguette. It is so hard that one can't help but look at the plate and wonder: Is this baguette a stone in disguise?
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 66 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Garlic Baguette
normal.description: Sliced baguette. Taken freshly out of the oven, the bread has a crispy, crackling crust, and soft, fluffy crumb. The aroma of butter and garlic further adds to the baguette's tastiness! No wonder you often see Fontainians buying a baguette on their way home after work.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 81 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Garlic Baguette
delicious.description: Sliced baguette. It is said that every now and then, the people of Fontaine organize baking competitions. The bakers who make the best baguette get to show off their skills in the Palais Mermonia. This baguette could definitely win first prize in those competitions!
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 95 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
